title: VE: Modeling Multivariate Time Series Correlation with Variate Embedding
details: S Wang, Z Man, Z Cao, J Zheng, Z Ge - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.06169, 2024
abstract: Multivariate time series forecasting relies on accurately capturing the correlations among variates. Current channel-independent (CI) models and models with a CI final projection layer are unable to capture these dependencies. In this paper, we present …
